title: Fragment, 1935
description: Lace fragment with a slightly scalloped edge and crown with the dates 1910 – 1935 between small floral sprays. Made at the time of the Jubilee commemorating the 25th anniversary of the accession of George V. Two pieces of red satin ribbon attached to the lace.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 1935.
1935. Medium: cotton
Technique: machine made. Gift of Mary S.M. Gibson. 1936-24-1.
